p: Strains of C. tropicalis (URM-6741), C. krusei (URM-6391), C. albicans (URM-6543), C. parapsilosis (URM-6557), and C. glabrata (URM-6393) were obtained from the University Recife Mycologia (URM) from the Departamento de Micologia of Universidade Federal de Pernambuco. The yeasts were grown overnight at 30 Â°C in Petri plates containing Sabouraud dextrose agar (Merck, Darmstadt, Germany), and inocula for use in the assays were prepared by diluting scraped cell mass in 0.85% NaCl, adjusting to 0.5 in McFarland. Cell suspensions were finally diluted to 10 6 CFU/mL for use in the assays.
